body:
Adding the `+metis` variant to make optional the installation of the metis.h and parmetis.h files to avoid collision for softwares using both metis and scotch.

I also changes the way esmumps is used to not have to patch the make files of scotch. Just downloading the good file.

I also remove the call of configure from install to follow a remark of @tgamblin  in #231 

@xjrc : I tried to compile the version 5.1.10b and 6.0.0 with +esmumps/~esmumps and +mpi/~mpi
plus some version with +metis/~metis, and did not get any trouble. Can you check if it still works for you.
title: Adding `+metis` variant to scotch + changes for esmumps
